	   var regex = new RegExp("^[0-9]*$");


   if(!regex.test(newValue)){


 gs.addErrorMessage('Incorrect Area value');


   g_form.setValue('area','');

   }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-16 05:13:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0a281a662f52a810552b58a72799b6a9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>areaval</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="REALESTATE" source="x_538229_realestat">286eb0bf2f7da010552b58a72799b6d8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="REALESTATE">286eb0bf2f7da010552b58a72799b6d8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0a281a662f52a810552b58a72799b6a9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-16 05:15:38</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0a281a662f52a810552b58a72799b6a9"/></record_update>
